title: Can anyone name these Headline Fonts?
content:
Hi there,

Does any one have clue on what the headline typefaces are on the 3 samples?

Im working on a Western theme with a modern twist– looking for some really solid headline  
typefaces with a modern twist (not overly western serif cliche). Thinking modern Wood Letterpress faces,  
like the third sample, with that slightly bleed edge feel. Im wondering if ’Baltic’ has had post treatment.

Any solid contenders out there for Wood Letterpress?

Thanks for your help!

Any suggestions most appreciated, cheers

Jason

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091120171300im_/http:/typophile.com/files/X_fonts_5724.jpg)
author: J_P_C

comments.content:
GRAVITY can be Antenna Black by Cyrus Highsmith:  
 [http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Antenna/styles](http://web.archive.org/web/20091120171300/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Antenna/styles "http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Antenna/styles")

Pieter
